chapter.text: 21|1|Seisan (no hi) wa ningen ni chikadzuite iruga, kare-ra (fushin-sha) wa mukanshin ni somuki saru.
21|2|Kare-ra no nushi kara atarashi kunkai ga kuru tabi ni, kare-ra wa sore o waraigusa to shite kiku ni suginai.

21|3|Kare-ra wa kokoro no naka de fuzakete iru. Soshite akuji o okonau mono-tachi wa, mitsudan shite (iu).`Koreha, anata gata to doyo tada no ningende wanaidesu ka. Anata gata wa me de mite inagara, majutsu ni demo kakatta nodesu ka.'
21|4|Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi no omo wa, ten to ji no ma de (katara reru) kotoba (no subete) o shitte ora reru. Kare wa zen Akira ni shite zenchi de ara reru.'
21|5|Kare-ra wa,`iya,(soreha) yume no yose atsume. Iya, kare no gisakudesu. Iya, kare wa shijindesu. Mukashi (no shito ni) kudasa reta yona shirushi o, watashi-tachi ni motarashite kudasai.' To itta.
21|6|Kare-ra izen ni ware ga horoboshita toshi demo, shinko suru mono wa 1-ri mo inakatta. Soredemo kare-ra wa shinko shinai tsumorina no ka.
21|7|Anata izen ni, ware ga keiji o sazukete tsukawashita shito-tachi mo, ningen ni suginakatta. Moshi anata gata, kore ga wakaranainara kunkai o uketa min ni kike.
21|8|Ware wa kare-ra (shito-tachi) ni, shokumotsu o toranai yona karada wa sadzukenakatta. Mata kare-ra wa eikyu ni ikiru wakede mo nakatta.
21|9|Kekkyoku, waga yakusoku o kare-ra ni hatashi, kare-ra to ware no hossuru mono o sukui, ihan shita hogai no mono-tachi o horoboshita.
21|10|Ware wa, anata gata e no kunkai to shite keiten o keiji shita nodearu. Soredemo anata gata wa satoranai no ka.
21|11|Ikaga ni ware wa, oku no aku o okonatte ita toshi o horoboshite, sonoatoni-betsu no min o tateta ka.
21|12|Sorede ware no chobatsu (ga kudaru no) o kanjiru to, mi nasai. Kare-ra wa soko kara nige (yo to su)ru.
21|13|Nigete wa naranai. Tanoshinda tokoro, anata gata no sumai ni kaere. Anata gata wa jinmon sa rerudearou.
21|14|Kare-ra wa itta. `A , nasakenai, watashi-tachi wa hontoni fugi no todeshita.'
21|15|Soshite kare-ra no kono sakebigoe wa, ware ga kare-ra o nekosogi metsu poshi hinokietayo ni chinmoku sa seru made yamanakatta.
21|16|Ware wa ten to ji, mata sonoaida ni aru mono o, tawamure ni tsukutta node wanai.
21|17|Moshi ware ga tawamure o nozomi, kari ni so surunaraba, waga tedjikana mono (hi busshitsu-tekina reitekina mono) kara erandadearou.
21|18|Iya, ware wa shinri o kyogi ni nagetsukeru to, sono atama o kudaku. Mi nasai. Kyogi wa shometsu suru. Anata gataga (ware ni tsuite) iu koto koso, anata gata ni tori wazawaidearu.
21|19|Ten to ji no subete no mono wa, kare no yudearu. Mata sono sokkin ni iru mono (tenshi) wa, kare ni tsukaete komande mo naku, tsukare mo shiranai.
21|20|Kare-ra wa mainichi maiban ni kare o tatae, yasumu koto o shiranai.
21|21|Soretomo kare-ra wa,(shisha o) yomigaera su koto no dekiru kamigami o chijo kara eta no ka.

21|22|Moshi, sono (tenchi no)-kan ni arra igai no kamigami ga attanaraba, sorera wa kitto konran shitadearou. Sorede gyokuza no shu, kare-ra ga tonaeru mono no ue ni (takaku imasu) arra o tatae nasai.
21|23|Kare wa, sono okonawa reta koto ni tsuite, jinmon o ukeru koto wanai. Daga kare-ra koso jinmon sa reru nodearu.

21|24|Soretomo kare-ra wa, kare o sashioite soto no kamigami o agameta no ka. Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata no shoko o dashite mi nasai. Kore wa watashi to tomoni iru mono e no kunkaideari, mata izen no sedai no mono e no kunkaidearu.'Daga kare-ra no oku wa kono shinri o rikai dekizu ni somuki saru.
21|25|Anata izen ni mo, ware ga noko wa shita shito ni wa, hitoshiku,`ware no soto ni kami wanai,dakara ware ni tsukaeyo.' To keiji shita.
21|26|Kare-ra wa,`jihibukaki okata wa ko o moke raremasu.' To itta. A mottainai. Iya,(kare-ra tenshi wa) eiyo aru shimo bedearu.
21|27|Kare-ra (tenshi-tachi) wa, kare yori saki ni tsugeru koto mo naku, mata kare no meirei ni motodzuite kodo suru dakedearu.
21|28|Kare wa, kare-ra (tenshi) izen ni aru mono mo,-igo ni aru mono o mo shitte ora re, kare ga ukeireru mono no soto wa, torinashi o shinai. Kare-ra (tenshi) wa kare ni osore tsukaeru.
21|29|Moshi kare-ra no naka ni,`hontoni watashi wa, kare to wa betsu no kamidearu.' To iu mono ga areba, ware wa kono yona mono o, jigoku de mukuiru. Fugi o okonau mono ni ko no yo ni mukuiru.

21|30|Shinko shinai-sha-tachi wa wakaranai no ka. Ten to ji wa, issho ni awasatte itaga, ware wa sore o waketa. Soshite mizu kara issai no ikimono o tsukutta nodearu. Kare-ra wa sore demo shinko shinai no ka.

21|31|Ware wa mata, daichi ni yamayama o suete kare-ra fushinjin-sha ni tottemo daichi o yuruginai mono to shita. Mata soko ni, orai no tame no hiroi michi o tsukutta. Sore de kare-ra wa kanarazu risuru tokoro ga arou.
21|32|Sarani ware wa, ten o yane to shi shugo shita. Soredemo kare-ra wa, korera no shirushi kara somuki saru.
21|33|Kare koso wa hiru to yoru, mata taiyo to tsuki o sozo sa reta katadearu. Sorera wa, kido ni ukande iru.
21|34|Ware wa anata izen no dare ni taishite mo, towa ni ikiru mono to shita koto wanai. Anata wa shinu no ni, kare-ra wa eikyu ni ikiru to iu no ka.
21|35|Hito wa subete shi o ajiwau. Ware wa shiren no tame ni, kyoji to kichiji de anata gata o kokoromiru. Soshite (saigo wa) ware ni kisa reru nodearu.

21|36|Shinko shinai mono wa anata o miru toki, tada chosho no-teki ni suru. (Kare-ra wa iu. ) `Kono-shadesu ka, anata gata no kamigami o hihan suru mono wa.' Kare-ra wa jihibukaki okata no kunkai o, botoku suru monodearu.
21|37|Ningen wa kimijika ka ni tsukura rete iru. Ware wa sugu ni shirushi o shimesudearou.Dakara isoide are ni saisoku shite wa naranai.
21|38|Mata kare-ra wa,`anata gata no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, sono yakusoku wa nanji (kuru no) ka.' To iu.
21|39|Moshi fushin-sha ga (sonohi) sonotoki,-gao kara mo, mata se karamo goka o fusegu koto ga dekizu, mata tasukeru mono mo nai hi no koto o shitteitanaraba.
21|40|Iya, sore wa totsuzen kare-ra o osotte, odoroki awate saseyou. Kare-ra wa sore o yokeru chikara mo naku, yuyo sa renaidearou.
21|41|Anata izen no shito-tachi mo, tashika ni chosho sa reta. Daga chosho shita mono wa, chosho shite ita koto ni torikakoma reru nodearu.
21|42|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Jihibukaki okata (no ikari) kara, chuya dare ga, anata gata o mamoreyou ka.' Soredemo kare-ra wa,-nushi o nenjiru koto kara somuki saru.
21|43|Soretomo kare-ra ni wa, ware igai ni kare-ra o shugo dekiru kamigami ga aru no ka. Kare-ra (kamigami) wa, jibun jishin mo tasuke rarezu, mata ware kara fusegi osenai.

21|44|Sorenanoni, ware wa korera no mono ya sono sosen-tachi o kyoraku sa se, sono kigen made nagarae saseta. Ware ga kono (fushinjin-sha no)-chi ni kite, sono sumizumi kara seifuku shite iru no o minai no ka. Soredemo kare-ra wa shori-shana no ka.
21|45|Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa tada keiji ni yotte, anata gata ni keikoku suru dakedearu.'Daga kikanai mono wa, keikoku sa rete mo sono yobikake ga kikoenai.
21|46|Soshite anata no omo no chobatsu no ibuki ga, mo shikare-ra ni (sukoshidemo) furereba,`a , nasakenai. Watashi-tachi wa hontoni fugi o okonaimashita.' To iu.

21|47|Ware wa shinpan no hi no tame ni, koseina hakari o mokeru. 1-Ri to shite tatoe keshi hitotsubu no omo-sadeatte mo futo ni atsukawa reru koto wanai. Ware wa sore o (keisan ni) mochidasu. Ware wa seisan-sha to shite banzendearu.
21|48|Katsute ware wa, musa to harun ni, shikibetsu to komyo to, osoreru mono e no kunkai o sazuketa.
21|49|Me ni mienakute mo omo o osoreru mono to, shinpan no toki o osoreru mono e no kunkai o sazuketa.
21|50|Kono (kuruan) koso wa, ware ga kudashita shukufuku yutakana kunkaidearu. Anata gata wa, soredemo nao kyohi suru no ka.
21|51|Ware wa izen iburahimu ni, hoseina okonai o sazuketa. Ware wa kare o yoku shitte iru.
21|52|Kare ga chichi to kare no hitobito ni, ko itta toki o omoi nasai. `Anata gataga suhai suru korera no guzo wa, nani monodearu no ka.'
21|53|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, sosen ga sorera o suhai suru no o mimashita.'
21|54|Kare wa itta. `Anata gata to anata gata no sosen wa, akiraka ni ayamatte ita nodearu.'
21|55|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa shinri o motarashita nodesu ka. Soretomo tawamureru-shana nodesu ka.'
21|56|Kare wa itta. `Sode wanai. Anata gata no omo wa, ten to ji no omo. (Mu kara) sorera (tenchi) o sozo sa reta katadearu. Soshite watashi wa sore ni taisuru shonin no hitoridearu.
21|57|Arra ni chikatte, watashi wa anata gataga se o mukete satta nochi ni, anata gata no guzo ni hitotsu no saku o megurasou.'
21|58|Koshite kare wa, kanarazu kare-ra ga soko ni kaette kurudearou to (omotte), yuiitsu-tai no kyozo o nozoki sorera o tataki kowashita.
21|59|Kare-ra wa itta. `Dare ga watashi-tachi no kamigami o koshita nodeshou ka. Hontoni kare wa fugina monodesu.'
21|60|(Aru mono ga) itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, iburahimu to iu wakamono ga, sono katagata o hihan suru no o kiita.'
21|61|Kare-ra wa itta. `Sorenara, sono-sha o hitobito no me no mae ni hikidase. Kanarazu mina ga shogen surudeshou.'
21|62|`Iburahimu yo, anatana nodesu ka. Watashi-tachi no kamigami ni taishi ko no yona koto o shita no wa.' To ichido wa itta.
21|63|Kare wa (kotaete),`iya, iya, sorera no naka no kono oki (guzo) ga sore o shita nodesu. Kare-ra ga kuchi ga kikeru mononara kiite mi nasai.' To itta.
21|64|Soko de kare-ra wa, mizukara (ryoshin ni) kaerimite (kokoro ni) itta. `Tashikani anata gata (jishin) ga warui nodesu.'
21|65|-Kan o oite, kare-ra wa mata hon'i shi (te i~tsu)ta. `Anata wa korera (kamigami) no,-guchi ga kikenai no o yoku shitte imashita.'
21|66|Iburahimu wa itta. `Sorenara anata gata wa, arra igai no mono o suhai suru nodesu ka. Anata gata o, sukoshi mo ekisezu mata son wa nai mono o.
21|67|A, nasakenai kotodesu. Anata gata mo, anata gataga arra o sashioite suhai suru mono-tachi mo. Anata gata wa, nao satoranai nodesu ka.'
21|68|Kare-ra wa itta. `Dose yarunara, kare o yaki nasai. Soshite anata gata no kamigami o sukui nasai.'
21|69|(Sonotoki) ware wa meirei shita. `Hi yo, tsumetaku nare. Iburahimu no ue ni heian'are.'
21|70|Kare-ra wa kare ni taishi sakudo shiyou to shitaga, ware wa kare-ra o hidoi shippai-sha ni shita.
21|71|Ware wa kare to (sono oi no) ruto o, ban'yu no tame ni ware ga shukufuku shita ji ni sukuidashita.
21|72|Soshite kare ni (ko no) isuhaku o sazuke, mata sono-jo no tamamono to shite (mago no) yaakobu o sazuketa. Ware wa sorezore o, tadashi mono ni shita.

21|73|Ware wa kare-ra o, waga meirei o hojite (hitobito o) michibiku doshi to shi, kare-ra ni zenko ni hagemi, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o suru yo keiji shita. Soshite kare-ra wa isshokenmei ni ware ni tsukaeta.
21|74|Mata ware wa ruto ni handan-ryoku to eichi to o sazuke, katsu harenchina okonai ni fukeru machi kara, kare o sukuidashita. Kare-ra wa,-nushi no okite ni somuku jaakuna mindeatta.
21|75|Kare (ruto) o ware no jihi ni hitara seta. Hontoni kare wa tadashi monodeatta.
21|76|Mata nufudaga, izen kare ga inotta toki o omoi nasai. Ware wa sore ni kotaete, kare to kare no kazoku o, oki sainan kara sukutta.
21|77|Ware wa, waga shirushi o kyohi suru min ni taishi, kare o tasuketa. Hontoni kare-ra wa jaakuna mindeatta. Sorede ware wa, subete kare-ra o obore saseta.

21|78|Mata daudo to suraimandaga, aru mono no hitsuji ga yakan kochi ni mayoikomi, sakumotsu o arashitaga, sore ni tsuite saiban shita toki no koto o omoi nasai. Ware wa kare-ra no saiban no rissho-shadeatta.

21|79|Ware wa sore o suraiman ni rikai sa seta. Soshite sorezore ni handan-ryoku to eichi o sazuke, mata ware wa daudo ni yamayama ya tori-tachi o shitagawa sete (omo o) tomoni tatae saseta. Sore wa (mina) ware no shiwazadeatta.
21|80|Mata ware wa, kare ni (kusari) katabira o tsukuru jutsu o oshie, boryoku kara anata gata no mi o mamora seta. Soredemo anata gata wa kansha shinai no ka.
21|81|Mata ware wa, moi o furuu kaze (o okosu jutsu) o suraiman ni (sazuke), kare (suraiman) no meirei no shita ni, ware ga shukufuku suru ji ni fuka seta. Ware wa subete no koto o shiru monodearu.
21|82|Mata akuma-tachi no naka ni mo, kare no tame ni sensui suru mono ari, mata sono soto no shigoto o shite iru mono mo atta. Ware wa itsumo kare-ra o mihatte ita.
21|83|Mata aiyubu (ni eichi to handan-ryoku o sazuketa). Kare wa omoni yobikaketa. `Hontoni saiyaku ga watashi ni furikakarimashita. Daga anata wa, jihibukai ue ni mo jihibukai kata de ara remasu.'

21|84|Sorede ware wa kore ni kotaete, kare ni toritsuita saiyaku o nozoki, kare ni kazoku o sazuke, sono hitobito o baika shita. (Koreha) ware kara no jihideari, mata ware ni tsukaeru mono ni taisuru kunkaidearu.
21|85|Mata isumairu, idorisu to zu ru kifurudearu. Zen'in ga yoku taeshinobu monodeatta.
21|86|Ware wa kare-ra o waga jihi ni yoku sa seta. Hontoni kare-ra wa, tadashi monodeatta.

21|87|Mata zun nundearu. Kare ga gekido shite dekaketa toki o omoi nasai. Kare wa, ware ga jibun o nangi sa seru yona koto wa nai to omoinagara mo, kurayaminonakade,`anata no soto ni kami wa arimasen. Anata no eiko o tataemasu. Hontoni watashi wa fugina monodeshita.' To sakenda.
21|88|Sorede ware wa kare ni kotae, kare o sono kunan kara su tta. Ware wa kono yo ni, shinko suru mono o kyujo suru nodearu.
21|89|Mata zakariyadearu. Kare ga omoni (inotte),`omo yo, mottomo sugureta sozoku-sha de ara reru okata yo. Watashi o kodoku no mama hanatte okanaide kudasai.' To sakenda toki no koto o omoi nasai.

21|90|Sorede ware wa kore ni kotae, kare ni yahiya o sazuke, mata tsuma o kare ni fusawashiku shita. Kare-ra wa tagaini kisotte zenko ni isoshimi, mata kibo to osore o motte, ware ni inotte ita. Ware ni taishi (tsuneni) kenkyodeatta.
21|91|Mata jibun no teisetsu o mamotta on'na (maruyamu)dearu. Ware wa kano on'na ni waga rei o fukikomi, ka no on'na to Sonoko o ban'yu no tame no shirushi to shita.
21|92|Hontoni, anata gata no kono unma koso wa, yuiitsu no kyodotaidearu. Soshite ware wa anata gata no omodearu. Dakara ware ni tsukae nasai.
21|93|Sorenanoni kare-ra wa, sono (shukyo-jo no) kotogara o, kare-ra no ma de kirihanashi (shuha o tsuku~tsu)ta. (Mamonaku) kare-ra wa mina ware ni kaeru nodearu.
21|94|Daredemo zenko ni hagemi, shinko shite iru mono wa, kesshite sono doryoku o munashiku sa reru koto wanai. Ware wa kare-ra no tame ni, kanarazu (sore o) kiroku shite iru.
21|95|Ware ga horoboshita toshi ni wa kinrei ga (kyosei-teki ni) a tte, kare-ra wa kaette ko rarenaidearou.
21|96|Ya~ajuju to ma~ajuju ga kaiho sa rete, dono oka kara mo ikioi yoku kudatte kuru toki made wa.

21|97|Shinjitsu no yakusoku wa chikadzuite iru nodearu. Mi nasai. Shinko shinai mono no me wa suwatte kite (iudearou). `A , nasakenai. Watashi-tachi wa kono koto o orosoka ni shite imashita. Iya, watashi-tachi wa fugina monodeshita.'
21|98|Hontoni anata gata (fushin-sha) mo, arra no soto ni anata gata no suhai suru mono mo, jigoku no nenryodearu. Anata gata wa soko ni (kanarazu) ochite iku nodearu.
21|99|Korera ga moshi kamideattanaraba, soko ni ochiru yona koto wa nakattadearou.Daga (kare-ra wa) sorezore, sono naka ni eien ni sumu nodearu.
21|100|Kare-ra wa sono Chu de umeku, sokode wa (soto ni nani mo) kikoenaidearou.
21|101|Ware kara zenko (no kiroku) o izen ni atae rarete iru mono wa, jigoku kara toku hanasa re,
21|102|soko no bina oto mo kikoenaidearou. Soshite kare-ra no tamashi ga nengan shite ita tokoro ni eien ni sumu.
21|103|Okina osore ga kare-ra o nayamasu koto wa naku, tenshi-tachi wa demukaete (iudearou). `Kore ga yakusoku sa reta, anata gata no hidesu.'
21|104|Sonohi ware wa, kakimono o maku yo ni sho ten o makiageru. Ware ga saisho sozo shita yo ni, futatabi kurikaesu. Kore wa ware no sadameta yakusokudearu. Ware wa kanarazu sore o kansui suru.
21|105|Ware wa (musa) ni kunkai o sazuketa nochi, shihen no naka ni,`hontoni kono daichi wa, ware no tadashi shimo be ga kore o tsugu.' To ki shita.
21|106|Hontoni kono (kuruan) no nakaniha,(arra o) suhai suru mono e no shosoku ga aru.
21|107|Ware wa tada ban'yu e no jihi to shite, anata o tsukawashita dakedearu.
21|108|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Watashi ni keiji sa reta no wa, anata gata no kami wa yuiitsu no kamidearu to iu kotodearu. Tokorode anata gata wa, kie shite iru no ka.'
21|109|Mo shikare-ra ga, somuki sareba itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa (anata gata ni) onajiyoni senkyo shita. Daga anata gata ni yakusoku sa reta koto ga, chikai ka toi ka watashi wa shiranai.
21|110|Hontoni kare wa, arawana kotoba o kiki shitte ora reru. Mata anata gata no (kokoro ni) kakusu koto mo shitte ora reru.
21|111|Daga watashi wa, sono (yuyo) ga anata gata e no kokoromidearu no ka, matawa ichijiki no tame no kyorakudearu no ka o shiranai.'
21|112|Kare wa itta. `Omo yo, shinri ni yotte o sabaki kudasai. Watashi-tachi no omo wa, anata gataga kuchinidasu (botoku) ni taisuru o tasuke o o negai dekiru jihibukai kata de ara reru.'
